all-products.title: Keila reversible coat
all-products.description: This long comfortable women's coat will definitely keep you warm and stylish during winter times. This padded reversible coat features a design with zipper closure, two front pockets with snap button closure, a high neck collar with hood and slit zipper details on both sides which makes it easy to move in and protects you from the cold weather. A musthave coat!
all-products.composition: Outershell: 100% polyester; lining: 100% polyester; padding: 100% recycled polyester
all-products.care: 30째C short spin, do not bleach, do not dry-clean, do not iron, do not tumble dry.

all-products.title: Nusa coat
all-products.description: This is the perfect women's coat for winter times. This warm padded coat features a high neck collar, a hood with cord stoppers, a quilted pattern, a hidden zipper closure and a snap button closure, two front pockets with a zipper and storm cuffs to protect you from the cold weather. The coat is lined.

all-products.title: Elona waistcoat
all-products.description: Double breasted ladies coat. This coat comes in a lightweight scuba quality with a soft feel. This coat features a classic lapel, two side slit pockets and a button closure. Because of the stretchy fabric, this coat is very comfortable to wear. Our model is 178 cm tall and is wearing a size (EU) 38.
all-products.care: 30C short spin, do not bleach, do not dry-clean, do not iron, do not tumble dry
